      • Weapon

        public Weapon​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String displayname,
              java.lang.String description,
              int range,
              int dmg,
              java.lang.String dmgType,
              int speed,
              int cooldown,
              java.lang.String spriteName,
              double scale,
              java.lang.String hitbox,
              boolean isMelee,
              int angle)
        generates a new weapon
        Parameters:
        name - allocation name of the weapon
        displayname - displayname of the weapon
        description - weapons description
        range - range of the weapon in blocks
        dmg - the amount of damage the weapon deals
        dmgType - the type of damage (e.g. physical or fire) the weapon deals
        speed - the speed teh projectile moves with
        cooldown - the cooldown or time one has to wait before being able to use the weapon again
        spriteName - name of teh sprite the weapon has
        scale - the scale the weapon gets displayed with
        hitbox - the hitbox of the weapon (or projectile)
        isMelee - if teh weapon is a melee weapon (is this unnessesary by now?)
        angle - the standard rotation angle of the projectile when spawned

    • Method Detail

      • reduceCooldown

        public void reduceCooldown()
        reduces the weapons cooldown

      • clone

        public Weapon clone()
        returns an extick clone of the weapon
        Overrides:
        clone in class Item
        Returns:
        a brand new Clone (wars)

      • resetCooldown

        public void resetCooldown()
        resets the cooldown to the maximum

      • checkCooldown

        public boolean checkCooldown()
        checks if one is able to use the weapon
        Returns:
        if one is able to use the weapon

      • attack

        public void attack​(DungeonWorld world,
                   greenfoot.WorldObj owner,
                   double[] direction)
        called when a player or enemy uses the weapon
        Parameters:
        world - the world the projectile gets placed in
        owner - the owner of the weapon (so they don't get hurt by it)
        direction - direction the projectile is flying in
